definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: fence about (Aram. word; swg, sog  sepsit, circumsepsit, clausit, sogo0 sepes, cf. Targum [[סיג]] Pa. fence about, [[סְיׇיגׇא]] fence; NH [[סוג]] fence about; Ar. siya0jun enclosure made with thorns,  etc., around grape-vines, etc. Lane:1460, sw=j II. make a siya0jun;—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. f. [[בִּטְנֵח עֲרֵמַת חִטִּים סוּגׇה בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּים]] Ct So 7:3 thy body a help of wheat fenced about with lilies (cf. esp. De Bu).

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: intens. Impf. 2 fs. [[תְּשַׂגְַשֵָׂגִי]] Is 17:11 thou dost fence it carefully about (> make it grow, as if [[שׂוג]] = [[שׂגךְ]], AE Ki Brd Du).
